meanings.sent1: That poor shmucks always falls for the same tricks.
meanings.sent2: Don't listen to those shmucks, they don't know what they're talking about.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy shmucks tripped over his own feet again.
meanings.sent4: He felt like a lost little shmucks in the big city.
meanings.sent5: The village was full of lazy shmucks who never did any work.

meanings.sent1: I can't believe that rude shmucks cut in line.
meanings.sent2: He's such a selfish shmucks, always thinking of himself.
meanings.sent3: The noisy shmucks wouldn't stop talking during the movie.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a trapped little shmucks in the boring meeting.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was full of rowdy shmucks causing trouble.
